django.contrib.gis.geos.io
==========================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.geos.io

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Module that holds classes for performing I/O operations on GEOS geometry
   objects.  Specifically, this has Python implementations of WKB/WKT
   reader and writer classes.



Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.geos.io.WKBReader
   django.contrib.gis.geos.io.WKTReader


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: WKBReader

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.contrib.gis.geos.prototypes.io._WKBReader`


   .. py:method:: read(wkb)

      Return a GEOSGeometry for the given WKB buffer.



.. py:class:: WKTReader

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.contrib.gis.geos.prototypes.io._WKTReader`


   .. py:method:: read(wkt)

      Return a GEOSGeometry for the given WKT string.
